subject: Order Cancellation and Refund
description_text:
To whom it may concern,

While ordering some Simsonn Plus X pedals I tried to type in one of the
discount codes, however I accidentally pressed pay now. Is there any way
you can refund my order so I can buy it again with the discount? I
sincerely apologise for any inconvenience I am causing due to my silly
mistake. My order was: ORDER #SSN2609.

Thank you for your time.

conversations.body_text:
I believe it was the code FFLV20 which was at the top of the website. It
came out to a discount of Â£14.78.

Thank you for such a quick response.



On Tue, 9 Sept 2025, 16:37 General and sales enquiries,
Okay, we've processed your refund request. Please check your account.
